mapper.insert: insert into msg_tb(msg_id, writer_id, writer_name, profile, text, room_id, msg_time) values(msg_seq.nextval, #{writerId}, #{writerName}, #{profile}, #{text}, #{roomId}, #{msgTime})
mapper.select: select msg_id, writer_id, writer_name, profile, text, room_id, to_char(msg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as msg_date, msg_time from msg_tb where room_id = #{roomId} order by msg_id asc
